author: Nintendo of America
description:
Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch is available now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/lost-eidolons-veil-of-the-witch-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   

Experience a turn-based tactical RPG experience with a roguelite progression loop, where death is just the beginning. Awake on a mysterious island of damned souls, where your only hope of survival lies in strategic combat. Choose your paths, allies, weapons, and skills wisely in your quest to recover what's lost, braving death time and time again. 

#LostEidolons #NintendoSwitch 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode five of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and check out some fun segments like Favorite Splatfest! with Jordan, Nine, and Lily and Learning Splatoon! with Nine and EE.

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #5 livestream on Saturday, Oct 18th at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/IQdczClL7m4

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. 
nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebo
title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 5
